# Task ID: 8
# Title: Refactor and Clean Up Legacy Code
# Status: pending
# Dependencies: 7
# Priority: medium
# Description: Remove or deprecate manual keymap files and update all references to use generated files
# Details:
Tasks include:
- Mark old layout files as deprecated
- Add headers indicating files are auto-generated
- Update include paths in source files
- Clean up unused code
- Update rules.mk if needed
- Ensure backward compatibility where necessary
- Document the new workflow in code comments

# Test Strategy:
Build firmware and verify no functionality is broken, run any existing tests
